mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_GUESTBOOK ( ID, GUESTBOOK_CONTENT, OWNER_MEMBER_ID, WRITER_MEMBER_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_GUESTBOOK.NEXTVAL, #{guestbookContent}, #{ownerMemberId}, #{writerMemberId} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, GUESTBOOK_CONTENT, GUESTBOOK_CREATE_TIME, WRITER_MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_GUESTBOOK WHERE OWNER_MEMBER_ID = #{ownerMemberId} ORDER BY GUESTBOOK_CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT TG.ID, TG.GUESTBOOK_CONTENT, TG.GUESTBOOK_CREATE_TIME, TG.OWNER_MEMBER_ID, TG.WRITER_MEMBER_ID, TM.MEMBER_NAME, TM.MEMBER_IMG_NAME, TM.MEMBER_IMG_PATH FROM TBL_GUESTBOOK TG JOIN TBL_MEMBER TM ON TG.WRITER_MEMBER_ID = TM.ID WHERE OWNER_MEMBER_ID = #{ownerMemberId} ORDER BY ID DESC OFFSET (#{page} - 1) * 4 ROWS FETCH NEXT 4 ROWS ONLY
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_GUESTBOOK WHERE OWNER_MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} OR WRITER_MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
